description: Malformed signature test vectors for security testing. All signatures in this file MUST be rejected by conforming implementations.

security_vectors.name: ed25519_zero_signature
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 signature with all zeros - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Zero signature is not valid for any message

security_vectors.name: ed25519_truncated_signature_31
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 signature truncated to 31 bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Signature too short (31 bytes, expected 64)

security_vectors.name: ed25519_truncated_signature_63
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 signature truncated to 63 bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Signature too short (63 bytes, expected 64)

security_vectors.name: ed25519_extended_signature_65
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 signature with extra byte appended - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Signature too long (65 bytes, expected 64)

security_vectors.name: ed25519_empty_signature
security_vectors.description: Empty signature - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Empty signature

security_vectors.name: ed25519_wrong_public_key
security_vectors.description: Valid signature verified against wrong public key - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Signature was created with different key

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_r_zero
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with R = 0 - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: R component cannot be zero

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_s_zero
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with S = 0 - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: S component cannot be zero

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_r_equals_n
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with R = curve order n - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: R must be less than curve order n (secp256k1)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_s_equals_n
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with S = curve order n - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: S must be less than curve order n (secp256k1)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_r_greater_than_n
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with R > curve order n - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: R must be less than curve order n (secp256k1)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_s_greater_than_n
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with S > curve order n - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: S must be less than curve order n (secp256k1)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_truncated_signature
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature truncated to 63 bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Signature too short (63 bytes, expected 64)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_extended_signature
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with extra byte - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Signature too long (65 bytes, expected 64)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_pubkey_wrong_prefix
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 public key with invalid prefix (0x05) - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Invalid public key prefix (must be 0x02 or 0x03 for compressed)

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_pubkey_point_not_on_curve
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 public key with point not on curve - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Public key X coordinate does not correspond to valid curve point

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_pubkey_truncated
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 public key truncated to 32 bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Public key too short (32 bytes, expected 33 for compressed)

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_r_zero
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 signature with R = 0 - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: R component cannot be zero

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_s_zero
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 signature with S = 0 - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: S component cannot be zero

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_r_equals_n
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 signature with R = curve order n - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: R must be less than curve order n (secp256r1)

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_s_equals_n
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 signature with S = curve order n - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: S must be less than curve order n (secp256r1)

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_pubkey_wrong_prefix
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 public key with invalid prefix (0x01) - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Invalid public key prefix (must be 0x02 or 0x03 for compressed)

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_pubkey_point_not_on_curve
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 public key with point not on curve - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Public key X coordinate does not correspond to valid curve point

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_r_at_n_minus_1
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with R = n-1 (boundary case) - behavior depends on implementation
security_vectors.reason: R = n-1 is technically valid range but likely not a real signature

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_very_small_r
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with very small R = 1
security_vectors.reason: R = 1 is technically valid but verification will fail for non-matching signature

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_very_small_s
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with very small S = 1
security_vectors.reason: S = 1 is technically valid but verification will fail for non-matching signature

security_vectors.name: ed25519_pubkey_truncated
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 public key truncated to 31 bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Public key too short (31 bytes, expected 32)

security_vectors.name: ed25519_pubkey_extended
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 public key with extra byte - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: Public key too long (33 bytes, expected 32)

security_vectors.name: ed25519_signature_all_ff
security_vectors.description: Ed25519 signature with all 0xFF bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: All-0xFF signature is invalid

security_vectors.name: secp256k1_signature_all_ff
security_vectors.description: secp256k1 signature with all 0xFF bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: All-0xFF bytes exceed curve order for both R and S

security_vectors.name: secp256r1_signature_all_ff
security_vectors.description: secp256r1 signature with all 0xFF bytes - MUST be rejected
security_vectors.reason: All-0xFF bytes exceed curve order for both R and S

notes.purpose: These vectors test that implementations properly reject malformed signatures and public keys. Failure to reject these could lead to security vulnerabilities.
notes.test_message: The message '48656c6c6f20576f726c64' decodes to 'Hello World' in ASCII
